name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！＂アニソン Night Fever!!＂【#角巻わため生誕祭2025】 [rhgRzAgYKDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Tsunomaki Watame and Tokoyami Towa perform 'Kasabuta'.
Short transition with a black screen and particle effects.
Tsunomaki Watame and Sakura Miko perform 'Catch You Catch Me'.

subtitles.original:
カサブタ
作詞・作曲：千綿偉功
subtitles.english:
Kasabuta
Lyrics/Composition: Chiwata Hidenori

subtitles.original: 明日へ続く坂道の途中で
subtitles.english: Halfway up the slope that leads to tomorrow

subtitles.original: すれ違う大人たちはつぶやくのさ
subtitles.english: The adults passing by whisper to themselves

subtitles.original: 愛とか夢とか理想も解るけど
subtitles.english: I understand things like love, dreams, and ideals

subtitles.original: 目の前の現実はそんなに甘くないって
subtitles.english: But they say reality isn't that sweet

subtitles.original: つまずきながらも
subtitles.english: Though we stumble

subtitles.original: 転がりながらも
subtitles.english: Though we roll along

subtitles.original: カサブタだらけの情熱を忘れたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to forget this passion covered in scabs

subtitles.original: 大人になれない僕らの 強がりをひとつ聞いてくれ
subtitles.english: Listen to one show of strength from us who can't grow up

subtitles.original: 逃げも隠れもしないから
subtitles.english: We won't run or hide

subtitles.original: 笑いたい奴だけ笑え
subtitles.english: So those who want to laugh can laugh

subtitles.original: せめて頼りない僕らの 自由の芽を摘み取らないで
subtitles.english: At least don't pluck the sprouts of freedom from us who are unreliable

subtitles.original: 水をあげるその役目を 果たせばいいんだろう？
subtitles.english: It's fine as long as we fulfill the role of watering them, right?

subtitles.original: 何度も繰り返した失敗とか
subtitles.english: The failures we've repeated over and over

subtitles.original: 大きく食い違った考えとか
subtitles.english: The ideas that were so far apart

subtitles.original: 僕らの基準はとても不確かで
subtitles.english: Our standards are so uncertain

subtitles.original: 昨日より何となく歩幅が広くなった
subtitles.english: Somehow my stride feels wider than yesterday

subtitles.original: 背伸びをしながら
subtitles.english: While stretching ourselves thin

subtitles.original: 打ちのめされながら
subtitles.english: While being beaten down

subtitles.original: カサブタをちょっとはがすけど 答えは出ない
subtitles.english: I peel off a scab a bit, but there's no answer

subtitles.original: 大人になりたい僕らの わがままをひとつ聞いてくれ
subtitles.english: Listen to one selfish wish from us who want to grow up

subtitles.original: 寝ても覚めても縛られる
subtitles.english: Bound whether asleep or awake

subtitles.original: 時間を少しだけ止めて
subtitles.english: Just stop time for a little while

subtitles.original: せめてふがいない僕らの 自由の実を切り取らないで
subtitles.english: At least don't cut off the fruits of freedom from us who are pathetic

subtitles.original: 赤く熟すその時まで 悩めばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: It's fine as long as we worry until they ripen red

subtitles.original: 大人になれない僕らの 強がりをひとつ聞いてくれ
subtitles.english: Listen to one show of strength from us who can't grow up

subtitles.original: 逃げも隠れもしないから
subtitles.english: We won't run or hide

subtitles.original: 笑いたい奴だけ笑え
subtitles.english: So those who want to laugh can laugh

subtitles.original: せめて頼りない僕らの 自由の芽を摘み取らないで
subtitles.english: At least don't pluck the sprouts of freedom from us who are unreliable

subtitles.original: 水をあげるその役目を 果たせばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: It's fine as long as we fulfill the role of watering them, right?

subtitles.original:
Catch You Catch Me
作詞・作曲：広瀬香美
subtitles.english:
Catch You Catch Me
Lyrics/Composition: Kohmi Hirose

subtitles.original: 会いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to see you

subtitles.original: 会えないな
subtitles.english: I can't see you

subtitles.original: 切ないな この気持ち
subtitles.english: It's painful, this feeling

subtitles.original: 言えないな
subtitles.english: I can't say it

subtitles.original: 言いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to say it

subtitles.original: チャンス 逃してばかり
subtitles.english: I keep missing every chance

subtitles.original: だって だって だって
subtitles.english: Because, because, because

subtitles.original: 翼広げ二人で
subtitles.english: Spreading our wings together

subtitles.original: 空をマラソン
subtitles.english: Marathon through the sky

subtitles.original: 夢をユニゾンしたい
subtitles.english: I want our dreams in unison

subtitles.original: ほら Catch You Catch You Catch Me Catch Me 待って
subtitles.english: See? Catch you, catch you, catch me, catch me... wait

subtitles.original: こっちを向いて
subtitles.english: Look my way

subtitles.original: スキだといって
subtitles.english: Tell me you love me

subtitles.original: そう Nice to Meet You Good to See You きっと
subtitles.english: That's right, nice to meet you, good to see you, surely

subtitles.original: 私の想い あなたのハートに 飛んで飛んで飛んで行け
subtitles.english: Let my feelings fly, fly, fly into your heart

subtitles.original: 迷わない
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate

subtitles.original: たまにね 無くなっちゃう
subtitles.english: Sometimes it just runs out

subtitles.original: 身体のバッテリー
subtitles.english: The body's battery

subtitles.original: あなたの笑顔で いつも充電満タン
subtitles.english: Your smile always gives me a full charge

subtitles.original: パワー全開
subtitles.english: Power at full blast
